item.title: ROX Refine Step Simulator
item.description: Summary This page contains the step-by-step refinement simulator for Ragnarok X. You may use this for reference before conducting real refinement inside the game, or just for fun. – Note: the crystal cost is only estimation for white 2h weapon, excluding repair cost. For blue weapon, multiply with 2. For gold weapon, multiply with 4. item.title: ROX Repeated Refine Simulator
item.description: Summary This page contains the refinement simulator for Ragnarok X. In this game, refining equipment has a variable chance to upgrade, failed, damage, and even downgrade. This simulator helps conduct a controlled experiment on this refinement mechanism, producing a report that may or may not be valuable for making refinement decisions inside the game. For step-by-step refinement simulator, click here. Simulator Input Parameters To use the simulator, please input the experiment parameters.
